properties.entry: SELECT TODAYHITS FROM HITS WHERE YRARSELECT = ? AND MONTHSELECT = ?
UPDATE HITS SET TODAYHITS = TODAYHITS+ ? ,MONTHHITS = MONTHHITS+ ? WHERE YRARSELECT = '2024년' AND MONTHSELECT = '5월'
SELECT MONTHHITS FROM HITS WHERE YRARSELECT = ? AND MONTHSELECT = ?
SELECT MONTHSELECT ,MONTHHITS FROM HITS WHERE YRARSELECT = ?
UPDATE MEMBERINFO SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE USERID = ?
UPDATE MEMBERINFO SET STATUS = 'Y' WHERE USERID = ?
SELECT USERID, USERNAME, USEREMAIL,JOINDATE, POINT FROM MEMBERINFO WHERE USERID = ?
